3 namespace Ubiquity\controllers;
4 
5 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UString;
6 use Ubiquity\views\engine\TemplateEngine;
7 use Ubiquity\utils\http\USession;
8 use Ubiquity\log\Logger;
9 use Ubiquity\controllers\traits\StartupConfigTrait;
10 use Ubiquity\controllers\di\DiManager;
11 
20 class Startup extends StartupConfigTrait {
21  public static $urlParts;
22  public static $templateEngine;
23  private static $controller;
24  private static $action;
25  private static $actionParams;
26 
27  private static function _preRunAction(&$u, $initialize = true, $finalize = true) {
28  if (\class_exists ( $u [0] )) {
29  self::runAction ( $u, $initialize, $finalize );
30  } else {
31  \header ( 'HTTP/1.0 404 Not Found', true, 404 );
32  Logger::warn ( "Startup", "The controller `" . $u [0] . "` doesn't exists! <br/>", "forward" );
33  }
34  }
35 
36  private static function parseUrl(&$url) {
37  if (! $url) {
38  $url = "_default";
39  }
40  if (UString::endswith ( $url, "/" ))
41  $url = \substr ( $url, 0, strlen ( $url ) - 1 );
42  self::$urlParts = \explode ( "/", $url );
43 
44  return self::$urlParts;
45  }
46 
47  private static function startTemplateEngine(&$config) {
48  try {
49  if (isset ( $config ['templateEngine'] )) {
50  $templateEngine = $config ['templateEngine'];
51  $engineOptions = $config ['templateEngineOptions'] ?? array ('cache' => false );
52  $engine = new $templateEngine ( $engineOptions );
53  if ($engine instanceof TemplateEngine) {
54  self::$templateEngine = $engine;
55  }
56  }
57  } catch ( \Exception $e ) {
58  echo $e->getTraceAsString ();
59  }
60  }
61 
67  public static function run(array &$config) {
68  self::$config = $config;
69  self::startTemplateEngine ( $config );
70  if (isset ( $config ['sessionName'] ))
71  USession::start ( $config ['sessionName'] );
72  self::forward ( $_GET ['c'] );
73  }
74 
82  public static function forward($url, $initialize = true, $finalize = true) {
83  $u = self::parseUrl ( $url );
84  if (is_array ( Router::getRoutes () ) && ($ru = Router::getRoute ( $url )) !== false) {
85  if (\is_array ( $ru )) {
86  if (is_callable ( $ru [0] )) {
87  self::runCallable ( $ru );
88  } else {
89  self::_preRunAction ( $ru, $initialize, $finalize );
90  }
91  } else {
92  echo $ru; // Displays route response from cache
93  }
94  } else {
95  self::setCtrlNS ();
96  $u [0] = self::$ctrlNS . $u [0];
97  self::_preRunAction ( $u, $initialize, $finalize );
98  }
99  }
100 
106  public static function getTempateEngineInstance() {
107  $config = self::$config;
108  if (isset ( $config ['templateEngine'] )) {
109  $templateEngine = $config ['templateEngine'];
110  return new $templateEngine ( [ ] );
111  }
112  }
113 
121  public static function runAction(array &$u, $initialize = true, $finalize = true) {
122  $ctrl = $u [0];
123  self::$controller = $ctrl;
124  self::$action = "index";
125  self::$actionParams = [ ];
126  if (\sizeof ( $u ) > 1)
127  self::$action = $u [1];
128  if (\sizeof ( $u ) > 2)
129  self::$actionParams = array_slice ( $u, 2 );
130 
131  $controller = new $ctrl ();
132  if (! $controller instanceof Controller) {
133  print "`{$u[0]}` isn't a controller instance.`<br/>";
134  return;
135  }
136  // Dependency injection
137  self::injectDependences ( $controller );
138  if (! $controller->isValid ( self::$action )) {
139  $controller->onInvalidControl ();
140  } else {
141  if ($initialize)
142  $controller->initialize ();
143  self::callController ( $controller, $u );
144  if ($finalize)
145  $controller->finalize ();
146  }
147  }
148 
154  public static function runCallable(array &$u) {
155  self::$actionParams = [ ];
156  if (\sizeof ( $u ) > 1) {
157  self::$actionParams = array_slice ( $u, 1 );
158  }
159  if (isset ( self::$config ['di'] )) {
160  $di = self::$config ['di'];
161  if (\is_array ( $di )) {
162  self::$actionParams = array_merge ( self::$actionParams, $di );
163  }
164  }
165  call_user_func_array ( $u [0], self::$actionParams );
166  }
167 
173  public static function injectDependences($controller) {
174  $di = DiManager::fetch ( $controller );
175  if ($di !== false) {
176  foreach ( $di as $k => $v ) {
177  $setter = 'set' . ucfirst ( $k );
178  if (method_exists ( $controller, $setter )) {
179  $controller->$setter ( $v ( $controller ) );
180  } else {
181  $controller->$k = $v ( $controller );
182  }
183  }
184  }
185 
186  $di = self::$config ['di'] ?? [ ];
187  if (isset ( $di ['@exec'] )) {
188  foreach ( $di ['@exec'] as $k => $v ) {
189  $controller->$k = $v ( $controller );
190  }
191  }
192  }
193 
202  public static function runAsString(array &$u, $initialize = true, $finalize = true) {
203  \ob_start ();
204  self::runAction ( $u, $initialize, $finalize );
205  return \ob_get_clean ();
206  }
207 
208  private static function callController(Controller $controller, array &$u) {
209  $urlSize = sizeof ( $u );
210  switch ($urlSize) {
211  case 1 :
212  $controller->index ();
213  break;
214  case 2 :
215  $action = $u [1];
216  // Appel de la méthode (2ème élément du tableau)
217  if (\method_exists ( $controller, $action )) {
218  $controller->$action ();
219  } else {
220  Logger::warn ( "Startup", "The method `{$action}` doesn't exists on controller `" . $u [0] . "`", "callController" );
221  }
222  break;
223  default :
224  // Appel de la méthode en lui passant en paramètre le reste du tableau
225  \call_user_func_array ( array ($controller,$u [1] ), self::$actionParams );
226  break;
227  }
228  }
229 
230  public static function errorHandler($message = "", $code = 0, $severity = 1, $filename = null, int $lineno = 0, $previous = NULL) {
231  if (\error_reporting () == 0) {
232  return;
233  }
234  if (\error_reporting () & $severity) {
235  throw new \ErrorException ( $message, 0, $severity, $filename, $lineno, $previous );
236  }
237  }
238 
244  public static function getController() {
245  return self::$controller;
246  }
247 
253  public static function getControllerSimpleName() {
254  return (new \ReflectionClass ( self::$controller ))->getShortName ();
255  }
256 
262  public static function getViewNameFileExtension() {
263  return "html";
264  }
265 
271  public static function getAction() {
272  return self::$action;
273  }
274

281  return self::$actionParams;
282  }

290  return \dirname ( __FILE__ );
291  }

298  public static function getApplicationDir() {
299  return \dirname ( \ROOT );
300  }
301 
307  public static function getApplicationName() {
308  return basename ( \dirname ( \ROOT ) );
309  }
